Instruction: Collect all the ingredients needed for the recipe.
Preheat your oven to 375 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease an 8-inch square baking pan.
In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Remove from heat, then stir in the sugar and quickly whisk in the eggs.
Stir in cornmeal, baking powder, and baking soda. Add milk and eggs, mixing well. Add vegetable oil and stir until smooth.
Pour the mixture into the prepared baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, typically around 30 to 40 minutes.
Rephrase the following recipe step: "Gather all ingredients."
Understand the variations in serving size and the recommended use of a cast iron skillet when following the printed version of this recipe.
